Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Life Technologies QuantStudio Dx RT-PCR Instrument
Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx RT-PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Quidel Molecular RSV + hMPV multiplex RT-PCR assay for qualitative detection of RSV and hMPV RNA in nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and identification of RSV and hMPV RNA in nasal and nasopharyngeal swab specimens from patients with respiratory infection signs and symptoms, aiding in differential diagnosis in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors
